title: 12-Cup Programmable Thermal Coffeemaker Demo Video (DTC-975BKN)
description: Cuisinart presents an updated version of the only 12-cup thermal coffeemaker on the market! This Premier Series Coffeemaker brews rich, flavorful coffee and keeps it fresh and hot for hours! The double-wall 12-cup insulated carafe is sensational in stainless, and our patented Brew Through/Pour Through Lid keeps air out and flavor fresh. Auto shutoff, an audible "cycle-complete" signal, and Brew Pause™ for mid-cycle pouring make this a coffee lover's top choice!
